column4: my question is simple : what can i use to delete partition of linux and not destroy mbr partition because i want to run windows
if you are going to install windows it will take over the entire drive and wipe out most everything.. if you want it to.

so you're getting rid of Ubuntu... and you wan't to use the empty space for windows.. I suggest joining ##windows and ask there since you'll be using windows tools.  If grub is still installed they can help reinstall the win MBR
